column4: hi, I have random lockups on thinkpad r52(1849-4wu). using 2.6.22-14-generic (Ubuntu 7.10) version of Linux kernel. I am suspecting the wireless driver, is there a way to turn on logging on a module?
can you do something for me?
do you have a fairly default ubuntu install? sudo iptables -L ?
do I have to run as root
